cs.activitystream¶

Module cs.activitystream.__init__

cs.activitystream.create_system_posting(cdb_object, msg_label, check_rules=True)¶

Creates a system posting. cdb_object can either be an instance of cdb.objects.Object or a cdb.platform.mom.CDBObjectHandle. msg_label defines the message label to use. check_rules is optional and set to True by default. If it is set to True all related rules will be checked before the posting job is created. Otherwise the job will be created directly without further checks.

class cs.activitystream.PostingRuleChecker¶
checkRules(oh)¶

Checks whether oh matches all rules that are specified for a system posting of the objects class within the data dictionary.
